name: Corto Maltese - Secrets of Venice
description: Let's set off in the footsteps of Corto Maltese! Along Venice's canals and narrow alleys, fight against a poison that ravages you, avoid bullets and explosions, face the unknown, and eventually open the doors of knowledge.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 850 MB available space

reviews.review_text: When I play a game, I expect an immersive experience. Having to leave the game to do research on the web is very disruptive. I did not enjoy this game.
